net.kyori.event.method.annotation

Class DefaultMethodScanner<L>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.kyori.event.method.annotation.DefaultMethodScanner<L>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - the listener type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    MethodScanner<L>

    public class DefaultMethodScanner<L>
extends java.lang.Object
implements MethodScanner<L>
    Implementation of MethodScanner using the built-in Subscribe, IgnoreCancelled and PostOrder annotations.
